pr_title: [bluetooth] Changed Bluetooth logs to use hexadecimal (#6914)

timeline.message:
Improved bluetooth logs

Changed bluetooth logs to print byte arrays as hexadecimal instead of an
array of signed integers.

Signed-off-by: Connor Petty <cpmeister@users.noreply.github.com>

Moved Descriptor notification logs into ConnectedBluetoothHandler

Signed-off-by: Connor Petty <cpmeister@users.noreply.github.com>

minor fix for logging consistency
